metadata.title: CVE-2022-48851 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:staging: gdm724x: fix use after free in gdm_lte_rx()The netif_rx_ni() function frees the skb so we can't dereference it tosave the skb->len.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
